caption.p: Activity‐directed expansion of a series of antibacterial quinazolinones. a) Potential Pd‐catalysed reaction pathways. b) Growth inhibition of crude product mixtures formed in the reaction array; hit reactions are highlighted (yellow boxes). c) Reaction that yielded the antibacterial quinazolinone 12. d) Some other antibacterial quinazolinones that were identified following scale up.
